name: Kate Barrett: The Minigames (Volume 1)
description:
Over 2018 I made a lot of smaller games in an effort to recapture a feeling of experimentation and freedom. I uploaded those games to Glorious Trainwrecks rather than here. But now, they are coming to ITCH for the first time!!

If you like my stuff, you can download this pack and play those games without having to download them all seperately!

This pack contains 10 small games! There are 3 games not included: Flamingo Quest, which was released seperately, LOCK HORNS, which didn't make any sense to anyone who didn't know who it was a parody of, and Mystery Of Glow-Peak, which will be in volume 2.

  1. Clone Fu
  2. Volcano Island
  3. Cool Slide 1
  4. Game Made While Procrastinating On Another Game
  5. Caught Between Dimensions
  6. Crawl Into A Hole!
  7. Terrible Lectures
  8. My Castle's Haunted!
  9. Binky C.L.I.X A.k.a Binky And The Blustery Day OR Binky And The Pie*
  10. Last GOTY 2018

All in all there's hours of games in here. Some such as Caught Between Dimensions and Last GOTY have save features, so there's a lot to do in them. The saves appear as text files in the game's folder. They all begin with an underscore so they go to the top of the folder.

Controls for each game are usually detailed in the game itself. But if you're stuck for what to do: arrow keys, Z,X,C, esc, are the default buttons in a lot of them.

I know these games are free elsewhere, but leave me a tip if you feel I deserve it!

*Binky C.L.I.X, the 9th game, features characters and models created by Mariken G, who is credited in-game, but also credited here
